Text:
For H.264 videos, you should use MPlayer ( http://www.mplayerhq.hu/design7/dload.html ), it's much faster than VLC. Or CoreAVC.ax filter for MPC (75% faster ffdshow)

By the way, how could you upload a torrent when TPB have database problems which makes it impossible to upload?

"We're experiencing some issues with the database. Please try again soon."

Has been like that for 2 days now.....
If nobody seeds, REMOVE THE TORRENT...
